element.title: Location
element.description: Where the font resizer will appear

corner.title: Corner
corner.description: Corner (of the previously selected location) that the font resizer should appear in

textColor.title: Text Color
textColor.description: Text color for the "A"s on the font resizer

backgroundColor.title: Background Color
backgroundColor.description: Background color for the font resizer

borderRadius.title: Border Radius
borderRadius.description: Border radius (in px) of the font resizer

fontSize.title: Font Size
fontSize.description: Font size (in px) of the medium sized "A"

opacity.title: Opacity
opacity.description: Opacity (out of 100) of the background and of unselected "A"s on the font resizer

onhoverOpacity.title: Opacity On Hover
onhoverOpacity.description: Opacity (out of 100) of the background and of unselected "A"s on the font resizer when the mouse is hovered over

transitionTime.title: Transition Time
transitionTime.description: Time (in milliseconds) for the text resizer to transition between its different states (e.g. no hover to hover for a change in opacity)

verticalMargin.title: Vertical Margin
verticalMargin.description: Vertical margin of the font resizer (in px)

horizontalMargin.title: Horizontal Margin
horizontalMargin.description: Horizontal margin of the font resizer (in px)
